flawed_nl_solution:
In one week he will have saved 20+10=<<20+10=40>>40 dollars
In two weeks he will have saved 40+10=<<40+10=50>>50 dollars
In three weeks he will have saved 50+10=<<50+10=60>>60 dollars
At the end of week four, he will have saved 60+10=<<60+10=70>>70 dollars

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
